summary: Netflix is a popular streaming service that offers movies and TV shows in many languages worldwide. It started as a DVD rental service in 1997 and launched its streaming service in 2007. Today, Netflix has over 277 million subscribers and is available in more than 190 countries. The company also creates its own shows and movies, called Netflix Originals, and has even started making video games. It is one of the most-visited websites globally, with the US, UK, and Brazil being the top three countries with the most Netflix users.
title: Netflix
